tswitem.name: Signet of Backbite
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Backbite
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you hit a target from behind who is less than 5 metres away from you, you deal an additional 125/250/375 physical damage. This additional damage cannot be blocked and it cannot glance. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
